pregunta: Me estoy olvidando de todas las respuestas del examen
respuesta: I'm forgetting all the exam's answers
incorrecta1: I forget all the exam's answers
incorrecta2: I'm forgotten all the exam's answers
incorrecta3: I forgot all the exam's answers

pregunta: Me he olvidado de comprar leche
respuesta: I have forgotten to buy milk
incorrecta2: I have forget to buy milk

pregunta: Me olvidaré si no lo escribo
respuesta: I will forget it if I don't write it
incorrecta1: I would forget  it if I don't write it
incorrecta2: I will forgot it if I don't write it
incorrecta3: I would forgot it if I don't write it

pregunta: Me voy a olvidar de conducir
respuesta: I'm going to forget how to drive
incorrecta1: I will forget  how to drive
incorrecta2: I would forget  how to drive
incorrecta3: I'm going to forgot  how to drive
